name: CubeRun (itch) (BillDam)
description:
This counts as my first ever game :), I made this with the help of Brackeys' tutorial.

Cuberun is a low-poly fast-paced platformer game :). It's pretty fun.

Feel free to contact me on Instagram @bill_hehe_man if you have any trouble with the game :)

Use A and D to move around hehe
